text: 16.20: FG 5.12; 14.3; 1 Ko 2.4-5; Hi 2.3-4Zisas Hevenan ndagim, ana phorga ruigi gumgi za kha nuianan vov, Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ bun, mbe nzua rui. Mbe maaŋ mbuim, Fhe Bakɨme Ŋina Ŋaar mbe phorga ruav, ŋkasŋkar mbe ndɨɨim, mbe mirikori ga mbuim, mba gumgi gum mbigi nta garav khaŋ nzuai, “Khe guigira Fhe Bakɨme buni ma!”
